korean: 동네 가게에서 재고정리 세일을 한다길래 다녀왔다.
옷이랑 신발이 반값 이하로 떨어져서 몇 개 건졌어.
사이즈가 맞는 게 별로 없어서 아쉽긴 했다.
그래도 몇 가지는 괜찮은 걸 찾았어.
특히 운동화 한 켤레는 진짜 대박이었어.
사람들이 많아서 좋은 건 금방 팔렸어.
나도 좀 더 일찍 갈 걸 후회했지.
옷장 정리를 해야 새 옷을 넣을 공간이 생길 것 같아.
다음에도 세일 소식 들으면 바로 가야겠어.
english: I went to the local store because, you know, they were having a clearance sale.
Clothes and shoes were marked down to less than half price, so I snagged a few things.
It was kind of disappointing that there weren't many items in my size.
But I actually found a few decent things.
Especially one pair of sneakers was literally a jackpot.
They were originally 100,000 won, but I got them for 30,000 won.
When I bragged to my friend about it, they were pretty jealous.
There were a lot of people, so the good stuff sold out quickly.
I honestly regretted not going a bit earlier.
Still, I feel good because it feels like I scored some great finds.
I think I need to organize my closet to make space for the new clothes.
I should donate or throw away clothes I don't wear.
Clearance sales are definitely a steal.
Next time I hear about a sale, I should go right away.
